entity.name: Norse - Freya
entity.subtitle: Goddess of Love, Beauty, Fertility, and Magic
entity.description: The most renowned of the Vanir, Freyja is goddess of love, beauty, fertility, gold, death in battle, and seidr magic. She receives half of those who die in combat, rules from her hall Sessrumnir, and taught the Aesir the shamanic art of seidr. Beautiful and fierce, sensual and powerful, she embodies the Vanir's connection to both life's pleasures and its mysteries.

relationships.allies: Her brotherFreyr(close bond), the Vanir tribe, vÃ¶lvas and seeresses who practice her magic
relationships.enemies: Giants who desire her (she's constantly pursued),Loki(complex relationship - he both aids and antagonizes her), those who would harm the Vanir or disrespectseidr

family.parents: Njord(father, god of sea and wealth), mother unnamed (possibly Nerthus)

family.siblings: Freyr(twin brother, god of fertility and prosperity)

archetype.description: Freyja embodies the Love Goddess archetype - beauty, desire, fertility, and the transformative power of passion.
